comment._content: LOC -- that's "Carranza." Bain's scribe reversed the zed.

comment._content: Venustiano Carranza was president of Mexico 1917-1920.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: José Venustiano Carranza Garza [known as Don Venustiano Carranza] (Cuatro Ciénegas,Coahuila, 14 de enero de 1860 - Tlaxcalantongo, Puebla, 21 de mayo de 1920). es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Venustiano_Carranza
